snippet: In London, the former Formula One and IndyCar driver Alex Zanardi won a Paralympic gold medal in paracycling, a hand cycle powered by the arms.
abstract: Alex Zanardi, the former Formula One and IndyCar driver, wins a Paralympic gold medal in paracycling, a hand cycle powered by the arms; he lost his legs in an accident in Germany in 2001.
lead_paragraph: In London, the former Formula One and IndyCar driver Alex Zanardi won a Paralympic gold medal in paracycling, a hand cycle powered by the arms.

headline.main: Zanardi, a Former Racecar Driver, Wins a Gold Medal
headline.print_headline: Zanardi, a Former Racecar Driver, Wins a Gold Medal
